sk1.name: Earthshock
sk1.desc: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

sk2.name: Overpower
sk2.desc: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

sk3.name: Fury Swipes
sk3.desc: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage. If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

sk4.name: Enrage
sk4.desc: Ursa goes into a frenzy, gaining a percentage of his current health as bonus damage. Lasts 15 seconds.
